masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Someone is MELTING all the snow in the city! Targeted heat bursts—every snowman, every snow-covered yard, gone. There's a man in a red suit generating thermal energy, ranting about 'ruining your precious White Christmas.' He's heading for the ski resort next!"

Requirements

  • Stop Heat Miser before he reaches the ski resort
  • Protect remaining snow—people were counting on a white Christmas
  • His powers are heat-based—plan accordingly
